title: Expression for arc length of curve

content.question: The length of the curve y=ln sec x from x=0 to x=b, where <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="0 less than b less than pi divided by 2"> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIWaGaeyipaWJaamOyaiabgYda8maalaaapaqaa8qacqaHapaC a8aabaWdbiaaikdaaaaaaa@3C86@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> , may be expressed by which of the following integrals?

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 0 to b of secant x with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi></mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>x</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaci4CaiaacwgacaGGJbaal8aabaWdbiaaicda a8aabaWdbiaadkgaa0Gaey4kIipakiaadIhacaWGKbGaamiEaaaa@4033@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 0 to b of secant squared x with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>x</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaci4CaiaacwgacaGGJbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWd biaaikdaaaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacaWGIbaaniabgUIiYd GccaWG4bGaamizaiaadIhaaaa@4130@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 0 to b of secant x times tangent x with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>sec</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>tan</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaaiikaiGacohacaGGLbGaai4yaiaadIhaciGG 0bGaaiyyaiaac6gacaWG4bGaaiykaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8 qacaWGIbaaniabgUIiYdGccaWGKbGaamiEaaaa@455A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral of the square root of open parentheses 1 plus open parentheses the natural log of secant x close parentheses squared close parentheses with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msqrt> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup> <mrow> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>ln</mi><mi>sec</mi><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeWaaOaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdacqGHRaWkcaGGOaGa ciiBaiaac6gaciGGZbGaaiyzaiaacogacaWG4bGaaiyka8aadaahaa Wcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaaqabaaapaqaa8qacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacaWG IbaaniabgUIiYdGccaWGKbGaamiEaaaa@4639@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 0 to b of the square root of open parentheses 1 plus open parentheses secant squared x times tangent squared x close parentheses close parentheses with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msqrt> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>x</mi><msup> <mrow> <mi>tan</mi></mrow> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeWaaOaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdacqGHRaWkcaGGOaGa ci4CaiaacwgacaGGJbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccaWG4b GaciiDaiaacggacaGGUbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccaWG 4bGaaiykaaWcbeaaa8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaadkgaa0Gaey 4kIipakiaadsgacaWG4baaaa@494A@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

content.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 0 to b of secant x with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mi>sec</mi></mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>x</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaci4CaiaacwgacaGGJbaal8aabaWdbiaaicda a8aabaWdbiaadkgaa0Gaey4kIipakiaadIhacaWGKbGaamiEaaaa@4033@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
